aboutpara: I am a Toronto-based Full-Stack Web App Developer with a passion for technology, particularly in the realms of Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and Machine Learning. My technical arsenal includes proficiency in languages such as Python, JavaScript, Java, SQL, C, and C++, and a deep understanding of frameworks and databases like React, Flask, Oracle, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I am adept at leveraging tools such as AWS, GCP, PyTorch, Spark, Airflow, Unix, Git, and Jira to build robust, scalable applications. My work is driven by a desire to integrate AI and ML technologies into web development, pushing the boundaries of traditional web applications to create more intelligent, efficient, and user-focused solutions.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.position: Full-Stack Developer at University of Toronto
experiences.bullets: Led a multifaceted team of developers in an Agile workflow setting, utilized Jira for project management, and implemented Kanban techniques and Git for version control to drive efficient and timely delivery of distinct project modules.|Developed an AWS Textract-based web application which revolutionized university economic research by automating 90% of tabular data extraction from historical documents and translation tasks, reducing research preparation time by 50% and bolstering team productivity significantly.|Authored AWS Lambda functions in Python for comprehensive data extraction, including file uploads, previews, processing, and downloads. Leveraged AWS API Gateway to deploy Lambda functions as REST APIs and AWS Amplify for effective management and deployment of the serverless backend architecture.|Crafted an engaging and easy-to-use React front-end interface in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, significantly simplifying document management tasks for the academic staff and enhancing their operational efficiency.

experiences.bullets: Conceived and actualized a web application that accelerated the company‚Äôs production efficiency by automating the generation of order sheets, effectively minimizing manual processing time and errors.|Employed the React framework, together with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to craft a user-responsive front-end interface. This interface facilitated seamless customer interaction and order specification inputs.|Applied Flask in Python for the coherent construction of the application‚Äôs backend. This innovation significantly increased efficiency by 60%, minimizing data analysis time and streamlining workflows, thereby empowering faster decision-making.|Designed and executed efficient data processing techniques using Python, specifically leveraging libraries such as NumPy and Pandas to manipulate and manage substantial datasets from mechanical and acoustic testing.|Engineered complex PostgreSQL queries optimized for data extraction and analysis, accelerating the generation of actionable insights from raw data.|Developed an interactive, real-time data visualization dashboard using skillfully crafted D3.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components, significantly enhancing the data interpretation process by visualizing extensive experimental and testing data sets.
